Class AppMethod

BOOSEapp

BOOSEapp.dll

Represents a method declaration in the BOOSE language.

public class AppMethod : CompoundCommand, ICommand

Remarks

Method bodies are skipped during normal execution and are only executed when explicitly called by an AppCall command.

Constructors

AppMethod()

Initializes a new instance of the AppMethod class. Also resets the internal BOOSE Boolean counter to avoid loop and condition evaluation restrictions.

public AppMethod()

Properties

Gets or sets the line where the method body ends.

Remarks
